snippet.title: Senza Peso: An Opera in Virtual Reality
snippet.description:
In this video, we show you the critically acclaimed Zensa Peso, a mini opera in Virtual Reality. This has been out for years, but is a real treasure, which is available for free at Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/496190/Senza_Peso/

Chapters
0:00 Intro 
0:45 Gameplay 
7:00 Outro
